data.title: LongReadSum
data.description: LongReadSum supports FASTA, FASTQ, BAM, FAST5, and sequencing_summary.txt file formats for quick generation of QC data in HTML and text format.
data.name: LongReadSum

evidence: README install command: "conda install -c wglab -c conda-forge -c jannessp -c bioconda longreadsum"
"LongReadSum: A fast and flexible QC tool for long read sequencing data" (domain-specific QC tool for sequencing data, used directly by researchers).
"conda install -c wglab -c conda-forge -c jannessp -c bioconda longreadsum" (installation via conda channels/package registries).
